title: #17 Measure your Calibre
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ABC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be a triangle and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" be the midpoint of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"BC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". Suppose the angle bisector of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\angle ADC"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is tangent to the circumcircle of triangle "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"ABD"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" at "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"D"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the measure of angle "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in degrees."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Other problems: "},{"type":"text","text":"Check your Calibre","marks":[{"attrs":{"href":"","target":"_blank"},"type":"link"}]}]}]}

title: #17 of June 2018 Grade 11 - Natural Sciences CSAT (Korean SAT) Mock test
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A sequence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\{a_n\}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1=1,~a_2=-1,~a_3=32"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfies"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n(n-2)a_{n+1}=\sum_{i=1}^{n}a_i"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"for all positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S(n)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" denote the number of positive integers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k\le n"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" such that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{1}{a_k}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an integer."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Given "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S(10^{20})=p\times 10^{q}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" where "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p,~q"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" are positive integers, with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" not a multiple of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" find "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p+q."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem has been modified by me, and is a part of <Grade 11 CSAT Mock test> series.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\displaystyle (n-1)(n-3)a_{n}=\sum_{i=1}^{n-1}a_i,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we have"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n(n-2)a_{n+1}-(n-1)(n-3)a_n=a_n \\
n(n-2)a_{n+1}=\{(n-1)(n-3)+1\}a_n=(n-2)^2a_n \\
na_{n+1}=(n-2)a_n~(n\neq 2) \\
n(n-1)a_{n+1}=(n-1)(n-2)a_n~(n\neq 2)~{\small \color{#3D99F6} (n-1)(n-2)a_n=b_n} \\
b_{n+1}=b_n=\,\cdots\,= b_3 = 64 \\
a_n=\frac{64}{(n-1)(n-2)}.~(n\ge 3)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore, we have "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{1}{a_n}=\dfrac{(n-1)(n-2)}{64}.~(n\ge 3)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gcd(k-1,~64) \neq 1,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" then "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is an odd number, which means "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gcd(k-2,~64)=1."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Same applies for when "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\gcd(k-2,~64) \neq 1."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Hence, either "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a multiple of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"64,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k-2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" is a multiple of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"64."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This means "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=1+64m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" or "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=2+64m."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Note that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" also satisfies the given condition, and with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{10^{20}}{64}\times 2=3125\times 10^{15},"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" we can conclude that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S(10^{20})=3125\times 10^{15},"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"so that "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"p+q=3125+15=\boxed{3140}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: #17 of March 2015 Grade 11 - Natural Sciences & Liberal Arts CSAT (Korean SAT) Mock test
body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"A sequence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\{a_n\}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfies "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{a_{n+1}}{n+2}=\dfrac{a_n}{n}+\dfrac{1}{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for all natural numbers "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Let "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"S = \dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{4}+\dfrac{1}{5}+\cdots+\dfrac{1}{102}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{a_{103}-5356S}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"This problem has been modified by me, and is a part of <Grade 11 CSAT Mock test> series.","marks":[{"type":"italic"}]}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Divide both sides by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n+1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and you see that"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{a_{n+1}}{(n+1)(n+2)}=\dfrac{a_n}{n(n+1)}+\dfrac{1}{2(n+1)}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Then define "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\dfrac{a_n}{n(n+1)}=b_n."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_{n+1}=b_n+\dfrac{1}{2(n+1)},"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_1=\dfrac{a_1}{2}=\dfrac{1}{2}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Substitute "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"n=1,~2,~3,~\cdots,~k-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and then add them sides by sides."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\begin{aligned} b_k &=b_1+\dfrac{1}{2}\left(\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{4}+~ \cdots ~+\dfrac{1}{k}\right) \\
&=\dfrac{1}{2}\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+~ \cdots ~+\dfrac{1}{k}\right)~(k\ge2)
\end{aligned}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"We see that this also holds for "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"k=1,"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" as "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_1=\dfrac{1}{2}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Therefore,"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_n=n(n+1)b_n=\dfrac{n(n+1)}{2}\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+~\cdots~+\dfrac{1}{n}\right)."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"horizontalRule"},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_{103}=\dfrac{103\times104}{2}\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+~\cdots~+\dfrac{1}{103}\right)=5356\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2}+S+\dfrac{1}{103}\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\therefore~a_{103}-5356S=5356\left(1+\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{103}\right)=5356+2678+52=\boxed{8086}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Oh, ok... Thanks a lot! Great solution, though!

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_2=b_1+\dfrac{1}{2\cdot2} \\
b_3=b_2+\dfrac{1}{2\cdot3} \\
b_4=b_3+\dfrac{1}{2\cdot4} \\
b_5=b_4+\dfrac{1}{2\cdot5} \\
... \\
b_k=b_{k-1}+\dfrac{1}{2\cdot k}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Add them all, and you get"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_2+b_3+b_4+~\cdots~+b_k=b_1+b_2+b_3+~\cdots b_{k-1}+\dfrac{1}{2}\left(\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{4}+~\cdots~+\dfrac{1}{k}\right)"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now we can eliminate "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"b_2+b_3+b_4+~\cdots~+b_{k-1}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" from each side."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{b_k=b_1+\dfrac{1}{2}\left(\dfrac{1}{2}+\dfrac{1}{3}+\dfrac{1}{4}+~\cdots~+\dfrac{1}{k}\right)}."}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
